content: Based on customer reviews and ratings, it appears that Peru Hop and Inca Trail Reservations may offer the best value for money for a guided trip to Machu Picchu in Peru. Both companies provide affordable options for different types of travelers, including backpackers, solo travelers, and families. However, the best value for money really depends on your specific preferences and budget, so it is recommended to compare prices, itineraries, and inclusions of different tour companies before making a decision. Also, keep in mind that the cheapest option may not always be the best option, so it is important to read customer reviews to get an idea of the quality of service provided by each company.
